Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization of the county of Steuben to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends the authorization of the county of Steuben to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes through November 30, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization of the county of Steuben to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
